utterances.value: Hey {{std.customer.name}}! I'd be happy to help reschedule your appointment with {{doctor_name}}. I see your appointment is scheduled for {{scheduled_date_slot}}, at {{scheduled_time_slot}}. What day or time would work better for you?

Let me check {{doctor_name}}'s availability. I see openings on {{first_available_date_slot}} at {{first_available_time_slot}} or {{second_available_date_slot}} at {{second_available_time_slot}}. Would either of those work for you?

I've rescheduled your appointment for {{requested_date_slot}} at {{requested_time_slot}} with {{doctor_name}}. Regarding lab work, I see {{doctor_name}} has ordered {{lab_work_details}}. {{instructions_before_appointment}}. Is there anything else you need help with today?
You're welcome, {{std.customer.name}}. You'll receive a confirmation via email shortly. Have a great day!
